ModMetaData.name: FCP CE Patch
ModMetaData.author: Alex Dyre
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.3.1.8

Patches the Fallout Collaboration Project to work with Combat Extended.
 Latest changes:
 - Patched Vault-Tec - Handy things for your vault! - Patched FCP Minuteman Equipment Teaser! (Thanks to Red_Bunny for providing the patches) - Patched FCP Raider Armor and Apparel Teaser! (Thanks to Red_Bunny for providing the patches) - Patched FCP Makeshift Weapons Pack! (Thanks to Red_Bunny for providing the patches) - Patched FCP Children of Atom Equipment Teaser! - Added new CE Loading Bench art from Ranger Rick! - Fixed patching for FCP US Army Equipment Teaser update
